description: Bored of the Rings is a parody of J. R. R. Tolkienâ€™s The Lord of the Rings. This short novel was written by Henry N. Beard and Douglas C. Kenney, who later founded National Lampoon. It was published in 1969 by Signet for the Harvard Lampoon. In 2013, an audio version was produced by Orion Audiobooks, narrated by Rupert Degas.
title: Bored of the Rings - Wikipedia
